keyMoments.title: Lina Meets the Straw Hats
keyMoments.description: Lina encounters Luffy, Chopper, and Usopp while they play in the water attractions at Spa Island. She is drawn to their playful energy and introduces herself and her pet Nukky.
keyMoments.significance: First introduction of Lina as a central character in the Spa Island Arc.

keyMoments.title: Lina Reveals Feelings About Her Father
keyMoments.description: Lina expresses her belief that her father is a liar who abandoned her and Sayo. She mentions he missed her birthday, which hurt her deeply.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes Lina's emotional conflict and character motivation throughout the arc.

relationships.description: Lina is Sayo's younger sister. While Sayo is mature and faithful to their father, Lina harbors resentment toward him for his absence.

evolutionMoments.description: Lina and Sayo are introduced as sisters searching for their father's gem-making research.

relationships.description: Lina befriends Luffy after meeting him at Spa Island. His carefree nature and promise to help rescue Sayo begins to restore her trust in others.

evolutionMoments.description: Lina bonds with Luffy, Chopper, and Usopp while playing at the resort.

relationships.description: Nukky is Lina's pet sea raccoon and constant companion.

reveals.information: Lina's mother died when she was young, leaving her in Sayo's care.
Lina's father left three years ago on an expedition, and she believes he abandoned them.
Lina is playful and childlike but carries emotional wounds from feeling abandoned by her father.

keyMoments.title: Sayo First Appearance
keyMoments.description: Sayo appears searching for her sister Lina. She is introduced as the responsible older sister who guards their father's research notebook.
keyMoments.significance: Introduces Sayo and the notebook that becomes the central object of the arc.

keyMoments.title: Sayo Explains the Notebook's Secret
keyMoments.description: Sayo reveals to Robin that the notebook contains their father's research on creating a genuine gem. Their father was mocked by the village for his work but never gave up.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes the arc's central mystery and Sayo's unwavering faith in her father.

keyMoments.title: Sayo Abducted by Doran
keyMoments.description: Doran abducts Sayo to force the Straw Hats and Lina to complete the research and find the gem-making method.
keyMoments.significance: Creates the main objective for the remainder of the arc and puts Sayo in peril.

relationships.description: Sayo is Lina's older sister and has taken on a caretaking role since their mother's death. She believes in their father while Lina does not.

evolutionMoments.description: Sayo is introduced as Lina's responsible older sister.

reveals.information: Sayo's mother died when she was young, and she has taken responsibility for caring for Lina.
Sayo is extremely intelligent and has been studying her father's complex formulas in the notebook.
Sayo maintains unwavering faith in her father despite his three-year absence.

keyMoments.title: Doran Reveals Himself and Abducts Sayo
keyMoments.description: Doran, the owner of Spa Island, reveals himself as the arc's true antagonist by abducting Sayo and demanding the Straw Hats find the gem-making method in exchange for her release.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes Doran as the main villain of the Spa Island Arc and creates the central conflict.
keyMoments.quote: Girugirugirugiru! If you want the girl back, you'll have to find that gem for me!

reveals.information: Doran is extremely greedy and materialistic, loving money regardless of its source.
Doran is the owner of Spa Island, which generates 10 billion Berries annually.
Doran has a distinctive laugh pattern: 'Girugirugirugiru!'

keyMoments.title: Nukky Introduced
keyMoments.description: Lina introduces Nukky, her pet sea raccoon, to Luffy, Chopper, and Usopp at Spa Island.
keyMoments.significance: Introduces Nukky as Lina's companion and showcases the unique creatures in the One Piece world.

keyMoments.title: Nukky Demonstrates Shapeshifting
keyMoments.description: Nukky demonstrates his species' unique shapeshifting ability, transforming into various animals, people, and objects while maintaining a small size.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes Nukky's abilities and adds a playful element to the arc.

abilities.description: Nukky can transform into various creatures, people, and objects of similar size. Transformations are accompanied by pink smoke.

relationships.description: Nukky belongs to Lina and is her loyal companion.

reveals.information: Nukky is a sea raccoon, a species capable of shapeshifting while maintaining their small size.
Sea raccoons can shapeshift into various forms using pink smoke as a visual effect.

keyMoments.title: Foxy Returns
keyMoments.description: Foxy and his crew suddenly appear at Spa Island pursuing Lina and Sayo for their father's notebook, marking his return as an antagonist.
keyMoments.significance: Brings back a recurring villain and creates immediate conflict in what was meant to be a vacation.

keyMoments.title: Foxy Unveils Mirror Ball Technique
keyMoments.description: Foxy reveals his new Mirror Ball mecha - a spinning mirror-covered device that reflects his Noro Noro Beam in multiple directions.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Foxy's continued innovation with his devil fruit powers and his preparation for another Straw Hat encounter.

keyMoments.title: Senju Kannon Noro Noro Beam
keyMoments.description: Using the Mirror Ball, Foxy unleashes the Senju Kannon Noro Noro Beam, reflecting his slow beams in all directions to hit multiple targets simultaneously.
keyMoments.significance: Shows an evolution of Foxy's fighting style into a more dangerous area-of-effect attack.

keyMoments.title: Foxy Defeated Again
keyMoments.description: Despite his new techniques, Foxy is defeated by Luffy's Gomu Gomu no Bazooka, demonstrating that raw power still overcomes his tricks.
keyMoments.significance: Shows that despite preparation and innovation, Foxy remains outmatched by Luffy's strength.

abilities.description: Using the Mirror Ball device, Foxy reflects his Noro Noro Beam through spinning mirrors to create a barrage of slow-motion beams hitting multiple targets at once for 30 seconds.

reveals.information: Foxy has developed the Mirror Ball technique to enhance his Noro Noro no Mi powers with reflected beams.
